== Ubuntu-AU Meetings ==

=== Date, Time, Place ===
Australian Team meetings are held on the second Sunday of every month, 8pm AEST (GMT+10) in #ubuntu-au on freenode.  Please add agenda items below

We use Meetingology to conduct the meetings. Details of how to use this bot can be found on the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/meetingology|Meetingology wiki page]]</nowiki>.

=== Current Agenda ===

==== Adding Items to Agenda ====
You are welcome to add any items that you feel should be discussed to the agenda for the next meeting. To do so, follow these steps:
* Navigate to the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-au/meetings|Upcoming Meetings]]</nowiki> page for Ubuntu-AU on the LoCo Team Portal
* Select the next meeting from the list
* Login to the Team Portal using your Launchpad account (login link should be in the top left corner of the page)
* If you are a member of the Ubuntu Australian Team on Launchpad, you will be able to add an agenda item to the list using the links on the meeting page.

If for any reason you are having and problems or difficulties accessing or contributing to this event page please either contact the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AustralianTeam/MailingLists|team mailing list]]</nowiki> or JaredNorris directly for further assistance.

Note: Please also e-mail your topic to the list so that all members (even those who can't make meetings) are aware and can contribute to the topic. This will aid in keeping meetings short and discussion open.

=== Meeting Logs ===

For all meetings after April 2011, meeting agendas and logs are kept at the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-au|Ubuntu-AU]]</nowiki> section of the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/|Ubuntu LoCo Team Portal]]</nowiki>. Please visit the relevant page to access this information for a meeting:
* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-au/meetings|Upcoming Meetings]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-au/meetings/history|Past Meetings]]</nowiki>

You can also access the logs directly from the <nowiki>[[http://ubottu.com/meetingology/logs/ubuntu-au/|Meetingology logs repository]]</nowiki>.
